divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to let dogs out and saw bright red light over house at the same time dad saw them from the front window. First there were 2 then three more. The were all in a straight line going from east to west and seemed to disappear in the night sky. There was no sound and we could tell the difference between airplanes flying over head and these things. Are they drones? It was too far in the sky to see a shape, but lights were very noticeable. Very bright red. We would like to know if anyone else saw them. I have never witnessed this before. It did not seem like 1 object since they appeared one at a time. The red lights went in a straight line and disappeared one by one in the sky. Sorry if this isn't informative enough, never saw this before. Have some video but not that great and have to figure out how to download.
Summary: 2 people saw red lights 2 at first flying in a row then 5 in total
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Romulus
There were no other sightings in Romulus on or around August 17th 2013
